title: GUI Help
body:
OK i was searching..
u can see the opponents death timer when u press tab..
so can i put that death timer in a line like my team death timer in tht left side?
like put another line below or at the right side that shows which opponents are visible... dead and for how long...
thatd be really helpful..

thnx.. i appreciate ur help

replies.body: If you wanted to do this just for yourself, well, that's straight up modifying the game to gain an unfair advantage, which is against the EULA. What isn't against the EULA is making a feature suggestion for Riot to... look at and not really do anything with.

>
> If you wanted to do this just for yourself, well, that's straight up modifying the game to gain an unfair advantage, which is against the EULA. What isn't against the EULA is making a feature suggestion for Riot to... look at and not really do anything with.

no this is not unfair advantage..
if u press tab u can see that anyway..\
im just putting it up on the screen

This brings up the old arguments of people having timers or their jungle camps. While it per se isn't an unfair advantage because everyone has access to it, the fact that you're getting a program to count it for you kind of does give you an advantage verses those who don't, **even though they have the full ability to do the same**. That is why, ultimately, buff timers became included in game, because the fact of the matter was that if you didn't have the timer you were at a disadvantage, and you may have never even known about it.

I'd rather not really get into the extreme depth and detail arguments like this brings, but more or less, design decisions like this Riot make in the best interest of their players. It's a shame that they aren't on the ball in terms of adding in common features and perfecting the UI to everyone's taste, but they're only one entity.

Hope this helps clear it up.

As I said, I'd rather not get to in-depth arguments about this. I have explained to you why you could be banned for proceeding with this modification, and suggested a solution (to make it a feature suggestion). I myself do not have the ability to implement such a tool into the game.

If you'd like a Riot staff member to look over this, try posting on the Misc. boards, or even make a support ticket.
